name: Sheep Shearer
Start point: Fred the Farmer in his farmhouse north-west of Lumbridge.
Description: Farmer Fred's sheep are getting mighty woolly. He will pay you to shear them.

Items required: Shears (can be obtained during the quest for 1 coin)

substeps: Talk to Fred the Farmer in his farmhouse north-west of Lumbridge (next to the sheep pen).
Agree to help him by gathering 20 balls of wool.
Obtain a pair of Shears. If you don't have any, you can buy them from the Lumbridge General Store for 1 coin.
Go to the sheep pen just east of Fred's house.
Use the Shears on 20 sheep to collect 20 pieces of Wool. Note: Black sheep cannot be sheared for this quest.
Climb the stairs to the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US].
Find the spinning wheel in the western room.
Use the Wool on the spinning wheel to create 20 Balls of wool.
Return to Fred the Farmer with the 20 Balls of wool in your inventory.
Talk to Fred to give him the wool and claim your reward.
